definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: cover, surround, defend (Ar. jan=a, Aram. [[אַגֵּן]] (Aph.), Palm. [[אגן]] Vog:Palm.132 ff.)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf [[וְגַנּוֹתִי]] Is 37:35 + 3 t.; Inf. abs. [[גׇּנוֹן]] Is 31:5 (c. Hiph. q.v.)—defend, subj. always ´[[י]]; obj. the city Jerusalem c. [[על]] Is 37:35, Is 38:6 = 2Ki 20:6, 2Ki 19:34 c. [[אֶל־]] (‖[[הוֹשִׁיעַ]]).

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: acc. to Ba:ZMG 1889, 178, who comp. Ar. yajin=a—[[יׇגֵן]] Is 31:5 + 2 t.—defend (= Qal), Jerusalem Is 31:5 [[גׇּנוֹן]]…[[יגן ]] c. [[על]] (‖[[הִצִּיל]]); obj. Yahweh's people Zec 9:15 c. [[על]], Zec 12:8 c. [[בְּעַד]].
